Author: Swanabe
Text: If this helps: I was sick with a sore throat, cough, and fever last week and had to eat with the pills (high dose Ibuprofen and Muscinex D) to have them be effective and not WRECK my GI tract. I felt like I was eating so much more than usual, and way more carbs. I was so worried and horrified that I was going to gain. But instead I lost exactly 3lbs and have noticeably more bone definition.

Author: nodamncatnodamncradl
Text: I'm happy to hear you've made a very important choice to prioritize your health. I'm glad you took your nagging illness seriously, and I'm glad you've committed to giving yourself permission to honour your cravings for the next few days
